description: This file sets up and runs a simulated Werewolf game using AI agents and a team management framework. It defines agents, assigns roles, and orchestrates game phases with detailed instructions.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents a player agent in the game with specific roles and instructions.

classes.name: Team
classes.description: Manages the game flow, roles, and interactions among agents.

methods.name: Team.aprint_response
methods.description: Runs the team response process, streaming the output based on the provided message and settings.
